summary: The Rogue Pack adds a few minor things to make a rogue's life that little bit easier.
descriptionHtml:
The Rogue Pack adds a few minor things to make a rogue's life that little bit easier.

It does this by adding some new craftables and changing some tempering recipes. This is a WiP as it started as a personal mod, but I felt like adding it after adding many of the newer options.

==New craft==
Lockpicks - 5 for 1 iron ingot
"Rogue Armour" - A set of armour aesthetically the same as the Theives Guild Master armour. Requires Advanced Armours, under "Steel" as uses Scaled Armour tags. The Armour rating is exactly the same as normal Thieves Guild Master armour. (The images are taken with a very high light armour skill).
*Hood - 2 Corundum Ingots, 2 Steel ingots, 2 Leather and 2 Leather Strips
*Cuirass - 3 Corundum Ingots, 3 Steel ingots, 3 Leather and 4 Leather Strips
*Gauntlets - 1 Corundum Ingot, 2 Steel ingots, 2 Leather and 3 Leather Strips
*Boots - 2 Corundum Ingots, 2 Steel ingots, 2 Leather and 3 Leather Strips
*Tempered with 1 Corrundum ingot
Longbow and Hunting bow recipes added. Easy to find, but felt they should be added. Longbow requires no perks, Hunting bow requires Steel Smiting.
*Longbow - 1 Iron Ingot, 1 Leather Strip and 2 Firewood
*Hunting Bow - 1 Steel Ingot, 1 leather Strip and 2 Firewood

==New Tempering==
Steel Smithing now doubles the tempering bonuses on a few light armours, mainly Stormcloak, Light Imperial, Leather and normal Thieves Guild armour.
Advanced Armours now doubles the improvement of Nighingale armour and Theives Guild Master armour.

Added note: This mod was made prior to Dawnguard, and has only been worked on again recently, so it may also allow for creation of other things that I may have forgotten about, if that is the case please leave a message and I will add it to the list.
author: Crazysam10
